ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(agentsync__NPN__c)), OR( ISNEW(), AND( NOT(ISNEW()), ISCHANGED( agentsync__NPN__c ) ) ), !REGEX( agentsync__NPN__c ,"^[1-9][0-9]{0}[0-9]*$") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: A valid NPN number must be all digits with a length greater than or equal to 1 and cannot begin with a zero. Please double check the entered number.
